summary: Vicouin Castle is a stone castle by Whiterun Stables. It comes with stables, a garden, a pool, and all other house needs. It also  comes with a new follower named Cazena.
descriptionHtml: Â Vicouin Castle is an old abandoned castle by Whiterun Stables. It is guarded by a stone fence and gate. In order to get through the gate you have to go purchase the key at the marketplace nearby. From there, you will see a statue of Dibella and two fountains. On the right is a path that leads to the garden. On the left is a path that leads to the Great Balcony. You can enter the castle either through the Great Balcony, or through the main doors. Inside the house you come upon the kitchen, dining room, and sitting area where your follower will be. There is a grand staircase that leads upstairs to the bathroom and the two bedrooms. There is another grand staircase that leads downstairs to your armory, pool, alchemy lab, and enchanting table.
author: devdogging45
